tool.name: PDAUG Peptide Ngrams
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool counts n-grams in the entire peptide sequence set and fitting their distribution with the power-law distribution (Zipf’s law) and plot the results.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** Takes fasta file as input with peptide sequences.
-----
**Outputs** * Returns html report file.
